3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have consistent height and thickness. Shadows provide great depth. Perspective is a clear angled projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Strong adherence to room dimensions and wall segments. Windows and doors are accurately placed per the source plan.

interior_elements.notes: Fixtures (sink, stove, toilet) and furniture are appropriately scaled and positioned.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering, but presence of original text labels in the 3D space slightly clutters the presentation.

detected_errors.description: Text labels and dimension lines from the 2D source are baked into the 3D render.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that preserves every architectural detail of the source floor plan.
